Dialogs.Text: LostDecipher2: It's quite simple really... It exists the possibility that someone touched something by pure accident.
MsMaki95: Someone? But, not many people come this far and the one investigating this room is mostly me.
LostDecipher2: Well, Maki, accidents happen, sometimes one can touch without realizing it and make a mistake.
MsMaki95: Are you accusing me of being sloppy?
LostDecipher2: That's not what i meant... I mean, even the most organized person can sometimes move something out of place and---
MsMaki95: That's what being sloppy is, Cipher! And i'll have you know, i'm not sloppy!
LostDecipher2: Come on, that's not something so terrible...
MsMaki95: It is if you are saying it out of thing air like this! To me!
MsMaki95: I'll have you know that i classified, and checked everything i individually touched! There is no way i touched something 'by accident'!
MsMaki95: Besides, the drawing was like this since we entered, in fact, since before i got invited so... It doesn't make any sense...
Thomas B: (That was sudden, but she is right... It doesn't make sense, if this was like this before any of them came, then my theory goes to the toilet.)
